!Translate for ZoteroTranslate for Zotero !zotero target versionhttps://www.zotero.org !Using Zotero Plugin Templatehttps://github.com/windingwind/zotero-plugin-template Translate for Zotero, a.k.a. Zotero PDF Translate, is a Zotero plugin. Translate PDF, EPub, webpage, metadata, annotations, notes to the target language. Support 20+ translate services. 中文文档 !docs/res/translate.gif Quick Start Guide Install - Download the plugin .xpi file from below. - Latest Stable - All Releases Note If you're using Firefox as your browser, right-click the and select "Save As.." - In Zotero click in the top menu bar and then click - Go to the Extensions page and then click the gear icon in the top right. - Select . - Browse to where you downloaded the file and select it. - Finish! Usage Open any PDF/EPub/webpage in the Zotero reader. - Select text, the translations are shown on the pop-up and the item panev0.2.0. !docs/res/en2zh.jpg - Highlight/Underline some text, the translations are added to the annotation commentv0.3.0; Modify & retranslate the annotation text in the item pane and click the to modify the annotation text and translationv0.6.6; - Add selected text along with translation to notev0.4.0; Only works when a note editor is active. !docs/res/addtonote.jpg - Translate item titles with right-click menu or shortcut v0.6.0. - Translate item abstract with right-click menuv0.8.0. Thanks @iShareStuff - Standalone translation window availablev0.7.0. View & compare translations from multiply services in one window! !docs/res/standalone.jpg - Dictionary for single word translationv0.7.1. - SentenceBySentence Translationv1.1.0. After a translation, press + and select . Only for en2zh and en2en now. Thanks @MuiseDestiny - Since v2.2.0, the concat mode shortcut is ctrl on Windows/Linux or ⌘ on macOS. Q&A Q I want to translate manually. A Go to , uncheck the . Click the button on the pop-up or item pane to translate. Q I want a translate shortcut. A Press shortcut after you selected some text. If you are in the collection view, the titles' translation will show/hide. Q I want to concat different selections and translate them together. A Press or select the check box on item pane when selecting text in PDF/EPub/webpage. Q Not the language I want. A The default target language is the same as your Zotero language. Go to and change the language settings. Q Translation not correct or report an error. A See Language Settings above and FAQ6. Make sure you use the right secret. Q I want to change the font size. A Go to and set the font size. Q I want to resize the raw and result text area in the translate panel. A Drag the separator up and down to adjust the size. Double-click the separator to reset the size. Settings General <!-- - Enable Translation, default --> - Automatically Translate Selection, default - Automatically Translate Annotation: Save annotation's translation to annotation comment or annotation body, default - Automatically Translate Annotation from Sync: Automatically translate annotations synced from other devices if , default - Enable Reader Selection Pop-up: Show results in the pop-up panel or only in the item pane, default - Show "Add Translation to Note" in Pop-up: default > Invisible if no active note editor opened. - Replace Raw: Use translation to replace the raw text when adding to note, default - Enable Dictionary: Single word will be translated using dictionary service instead of translate service, default - Show Play Buttons: Show the word pronunciation play buttons if available, default - Auto-play Pronunciation, default Service The default service is Google Translate. User Interface - : The font size of result text, default - : The line height of result text, default - : Show or hide Title/Abstract tanslation, default - : Show or hide elements in the item pane, default - : Press key to enable concat mode when selecting text in PDF/EPub/webpage if , default - : Reverse the order of Raw/Result in the item pane if , default - : Show or hide Title/Abstract tanslation in the item info rows - : Top the standalone translate panel if , default - : Remember size of pop-up if , else automatically adjust the size, default Advanced - Strip empty lines and thinking from translation results: Automatically remove empty lines or thinking labels from translation results, especially for some LLM translation services. - Automatically Detect Item Language - Disable Automatic Translation when File Language iscomma-separated: If you want to disable automatic translation in and files, set . Default . - Delimiter between text and translation: When translating annotations, the result will be wrapped inside this character to allow safe re-translate. If set to empty, re-translating annotations will replace the annotation comment/body with the new translate result. - Regex for removing extra text from translation results leave empty to disable: Automatically remove text from translation results using regex. You need to understand how to use regex in advance. - Reset field of selected items in library: Batch reset the Title Translation or Abstract Translation of selected items. Add translation task processor under with the same format with other services. The export function set the translation result to if runs successfully and throw an error if fails; 3. Import the task processor function in . 4. Add locale string in and . 5. Build and test. Extra options for translate service If the service requires extra options, the minimal implement would be putting them in the input in the prefs window, like the existing services does. If there are complex options, please bind a callback in which create a highly customizable dialog window with .
